title: Brazil : voting intention for 2018 presidential elections , by candidate
summary: This grouped bar chart represents SOME LABEL on the Y-axis. And, its value throughout 30 Months for Situation A, and Situation B.
All through the Months, the SOME LABEL for Situation A have lowered. On the other hand, for Month the SOME LABEL have climbed.
In Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT), Situation A had the highest SOME LABEL 39.0 among the 2 groups and in Don't know, Situation A had the lowest SOME LABEL 0.0.
In Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT), Situation A had the maximum SOME LABEL and it saw the lowest in Month Don't know out of all 30 Months.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents SOME LABEL on the Y-axis. And, how the value changed throughout 30 Months for Situation A, and Situation B.
All through the Months, the SOME LABEL for Situation A have lowered. On the other hand, for Month the SOME LABEL have climbed.

All through the Months, the SOME LABEL for Situation A have lowered. On the other hand, for Month the SOME LABEL have climbed.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents SOME LABEL on the Y-axis. And, how the value changed throughout 30 Months for Situation A, and Situation B.
Over the 30 Months, the SOME LABEL for Situation A have been lowered whereas climbed for Month.
In Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT), Situation A had the highest SOME LABEL 39.0 among the 2 groups and in Don't know, Situation A had the lowest SOME LABEL 0.0.
In Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT), Situation A had the maximum SOME LABEL and it saw the lowest in Month Don't know out of all 30 Months.
Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT) and Don't know had the biggest gap of 38.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for Situation A.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum SOME LABEL was found in case of Situation A.
On average, the Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT) had the highest SOME LABEL for all 2 groups Situation A, and Situation B. Whereas João Goulart Filho (PPL) had the lowest average SOME LABEL.

data.Month: Blank or voided ballots / No vote
